lines.gurmukhi: pRym rMg smsir pujis n koaU rMg; pRym rMg pujis n An rs smwin kY [

Unknown.translation: No colour or shade can reach the hue of love nor anyone can reach near the elixir of love.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: pRym dI fOl Fwl cwl dy brwbr hor koeI rMg FMg nhIˆ puj skdw, pRym dy rs sÍwd vw hrK nUM nhIˆ pug skdw, koeI dUsrw rs bRwbrI qy[

lines.gurmukhi: pRym gMD pujis n Awn koaUAY sugMD; pRym pRBuqw pujis pRBuqw n Awn kY [

Unknown.translation: The loving fragrance produced as a result of contemplation on Guru's words cannot be reached by any other fragrance in the world, nor any praise of the world can match the praise of love resulted from Naam Simran.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: pRym dI mihk pRym dI DuMm jo idl idmwg AMdr m`cdI hY Es nUM hI puj skdI hor koeI BI sugMDI vwsnw dI pRivrqI qoˆ aupjn vwlI dSw, Aru pRym qoˆ jo pRBqweI mh`qqw SkqI sMpMnqw pRwpq huMdI hY ArQwq pRym qoˆ jo smr`Qw pRymI dy AMdr pRgitAw krdI hY, Es nUM kY Awn koeI hor dUsrI Bwˆq dI pRBuqw nhIˆ pug skdI, AQvw pRBqw mwqR sMswr Br dI pRBuqw cODr BI Awn ky mUrqI mwn ho ky pRym dI cODrqw smUh swDnwˆ dy swDn qoˆ pRwpq hox hwrI is`DI qoˆ bhuq v`D is`DI dw twkrw kry qwˆ nhIˆ kr skdI[

lines.gurmukhi: pRym qolu quil n pujis qol qulwDwr; mol pRym pujis n srb inDwn kY [

Unknown.translation: The mergence of Guru's words in the consciousness cannot be measured by any balance or measures. The invaluable love cannot be reached by any treasure of the world.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: pRym dy qol dy qu`l bRwbr nw koeI v`tw hI qy nwhI koeI qkVI AQvw qoln hwrw pug skdw hY[ Aqy pRym dy mu`l nUM smUh in`DIAwˆ sMswr Br dy ^zwinAwˆ dIAwˆ ivBUqIAwˆ nhIˆ pug skdIAwˆ[ Bwv, AYsy koeI pdwrQ vfmu`ly sMswr ivKy nhIˆ pRwpq ho skdy; jYsw Amolk ik pRym huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: eyk bol pRym kY pujis nhI bol koaUAY; igAwn aunmwn As Qkq kotwin kY [170[

Unknown.translation: A loving word resulting from the Naam Simran cannot be matched by any explanation or elucidation of the world. Millions of volumes have consumed themselves trying to estimate this state. (170)
